title: I have lag on my laptop dell inspiron 640m
body: I have 2.00 ram 1.66ghz and intel centrino duo

replies.body:
Depending on the kind of lag you're seeing we may not be able to help much here since your processor doesn't meet our [minimum system requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements).

If you're seeing ping spikes, I'd recommend taking a look at our [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but for in-game framerate or other types of lag, the best recommendation I could have is to make sure that all the graphical and other in-game settings are at their lowest.

But frequency on the processor isn't that important if it can do more per cycle. Technically, I can run League on a Core m (and that's 0.8 GHz on my model) and still run it smoothly. The minimum specs should be just more than X GHz minimum, because higher clock doesn't mean faster speed.

i.e. Intel Core 2 Duo @ 1.8 GHz still performs better than Intel Pentium 4 @ 3.6GHz

Give a baseline series that works for most OEMs, For example; you can run League of Legends most likely on more recent Celeron processors, and slightly older Pentium and i3s for Intel, and newer Semprons, and older Phenom series etc.
